an3.60:1.1: Atha kho sangaravo brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an3.60:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho sangaravo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.60:1.5: Tatra, bho gotama, yo ceva yajati yo ca yajapeti sabbe te anekasaririkam punnappatipadam patipanna honti, yadidam yannadhikaranam.
an3.60:1.6: Yo panayam, bho gotama, yassa va tassa va kula agarasma anagariyam pabbajito ekamattanam dameti, ekamattanam sameti, ekamattanam parinibbapeti, evamassayam ekasaririkam punnappatipadam patipanno hoti, yadidam pabbajjadhikaranan”ti.
an3.60:2.1: “Tena hi, brahmana, tannevettha patipucchissami. Yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasi.
an3.60:2.3: idha tathagato loke uppajjati araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava.
an3.60:2.5: ‘ethayam maggo ayam patipada yathapatipanno aham anuttaram brahmacariyogadham sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedemi;
an3.60:2.6: etha, tumhepi tatha patipajjatha, yathapatipanna tumhepi anuttaram brahmacariyogadham sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharissatha’ti.
an3.60:2.7: Iti ayanceva sattha dhammam deseti, pare ca tathatthaya patipajjanti, tani kho pana honti anekanipi satani anekanipi sahassani anekanipi satasahassani.
an3.60:3.2: iccayam evam sante ekasaririka va punnappatipada hoti anekasaririka va, yadidam pabbajjadhikaranan”ti?
an3.60:3.3: “Iccayampi, bho gotama, evam sante anekasaririka punnappatipada hoti, yadidam pabbajjadhikaranan”ti.
an3.60:4.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando sangaravam brahmanam etadavoca:
an3.60:4.2: “imasam te, brahmana, dvinnam patipadanam katama patipada khamati appatthatara ca appasamarambhatara ca mahapphalatara ca mahanisamsatara ca”ti?
an3.60:4.3: Evam vutte, sangaravo brahmano ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an3.60:4.5: Ete me pujja, ete me pasamsa”ti.
an3.60:5.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasma anando sangaravam brahmanam etadavoca:
an3.60:5.3: ‘ke va te pujja ke va te pasamsa’ti?
an3.60:5.5: ‘imasam te, brahmana, dvinnam patipadanam katama patipada khamati appatthatara ca appasamarambhatara ca mahapphalatara ca mahanisamsatara ca’”ti?
an3.60:5.6: Dutiyampi kho sangaravo brahmano ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an3.60:5.8: Ete me pujja, ete me pasamsa”ti.
an3.60:6.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma anando sangaravam brahmanam etadavoca:
an3.60:6.3: ‘ke va te pujja ke va te pasamsa’ti?
an3.60:6.5: ‘imasam te, brahmana, dvinnam patipadanam katama patipada khamati appatthatara ca appasamarambhatara ca mahapphalatara ca mahanisamsatara ca’”ti?
an3.60:6.6: Tatiyampi kho sangaravo brahmano ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an3.60:6.8: Ete me pujja, ete me pasamsa”ti.
an3.60:7.2: “yava tatiyampi kho sangaravo brahmano anandena sahadhammikam panham puttho samsadeti no vissajjeti.
an3.60:7.4: Atha kho bhagava sangaravam brahmanam etadavoca:
an3.60:7.5: “ka nvajja, brahmana, rajantepure rajapurisanam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam antarakatha udapadi”ti?
an3.60:7.6: “Ayam khvajja, bho gotama, rajantepure rajapurisanam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam antarakatha udapadi:
an3.60:7.7: ‘pubbe sudam appatara ceva bhikkhu ahesum bahutara ca uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam dassesum;
an3.60:7.8: etarahi pana bahutara ceva bhikkhu appatara ca uttari manussadhamma iddhipatihariyam dassenti’ti.
an3.60:7.9: Ayam khvajja, bho gotama, rajantepure rajapurisanam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam antarakatha udapadi”ti.
an3.60:8.5: Idha, brahmana, ekacco anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti: ‘ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti; avibhavam, tirobhavam; tirokuttam tiropakaram tiropabbatam asajjamano gacchati, seyyathapi akase; pathaviyapi ummujjanimujjam karoti, seyyathapi udake; udakepi abhijjamane gacchati, seyyathapi pathaviyam; akasepi pallankena kamati, seyyathapi pakkhi sakuno; imepi candimasuriye evammahiddhike evammahanubhave panina parimasati parimajjati, yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti’.
an3.60:9.3: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
an3.60:9.4: So bahuncepi adisati tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
an3.60:10.1: Idha pana, brahmana, ekacco na heva kho nimittena adisati, api ca kho manussanam va amanussanam va devatanam va saddam sutva adisati:
an3.60:10.2: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
an3.60:10.3: So bahuncepi adisati tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
an3.60:11.1: Idha pana, brahmana, ekacco na heva kho nimittena adisati napi manussanam va amanussanam va devatanam va saddam sutva adisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicarayato vitakkavippharasaddam sutva adisati:
an3.60:11.2: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
an3.60:11.3: So bahuncepi adisati tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
an3.60:12.1: Idha pana, brahmana, ekacco na heva kho nimittena adisati, napi manussanam va amanussanam va devatanam va saddam sutva adisati, napi vitakkayato vicarayato vitakkavippharasaddam sutva adisati, api ca kho avitakkam avicaram samadhim samapannassa cetasa ceto paricca pajanati:
an3.60:12.2: ‘yatha imassa bhoto manosankhara panihita imassa cittassa anantara amum nama vitakkam vitakkessati’ti.
an3.60:12.3: So bahuncepi adisati tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
an3.60:13.3: ‘evam vitakketha, ma evam vitakkayittha; evam manasi karotha, ma evam manasakattha; idam pajahatha, idam upasampajja viharatha’ti.
an3.60:13.6: Imesam te, brahmana, tinnam patihariyanam katamam patihariyam khamati abhikkantataranca panitataranca”ti?
an3.60:14.1: “Tatra, bho gotama, yadidam patihariyam idhekacco anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti …pe…
an3.60:14.3: idam, bho gotama, patihariyam yova nam karoti sova nam patisamvedeti, yova nam karoti tasseva tam hoti.
an3.60:14.4: Idam me, bho gotama, patihariyam mayasahadhammarupam viya khayati.
an3.60:15.1: Yampidam, bho gotama, patihariyam idhekacco nimittena adisati:
an3.60:15.2: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti, so bahuncepi adisati tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
an3.60:15.3: Idha pana, bho gotama, ekacco na heva kho nimittena adisati, api ca kho manussanam va amanussanam va devatanam va saddam sutva adisati …pe…
an3.60:15.4: napi manussanam va amanussanam va devatanam va saddam sutva adisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicarayato vitakkavippharasaddam sutva adisati …pe…
an3.60:15.5: napi vitakkayato vicarayato vitakkavippharasaddam sutva adisati, api ca kho avitakkam avicaram samadhim samapannassa cetasa ceto paricca pajanati:
an3.60:15.6: ‘yatha imassa bhoto manosankhara panihita imassa cittassa anantara amham nama vitakkam vitakkessati’ti, so bahuncepi adisati tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
an3.60:15.7: Idampi, bho gotama, patihariyam yova nam karoti sova nam patisamvedeti, yova nam karoti tasseva tam hoti.
an3.60:15.8: Idampi me, bho gotama, patihariyam mayasahadhammarupam viya khayati.
an3.60:16.1: Yanca kho idam, bho gotama, patihariyam idhekacco evam anusasati:
an3.60:16.2: ‘evam vitakketha, ma evam vitakkayittha; evam manasi karotha, ma evam manasakattha; idam pajahatha, idam upasampajja viharatha’ti.
an3.60:16.3: Idameva, bho gotama, patihariyam khamati imesam tinnam patihariyanam abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
an3.60:17.1: Acchariyam, bho gotama, abbhutam, bho gotama.
an3.60:17.2: Yavasubhasitamidam bhota gotamena imehi ca mayam tihi patihariyehi samannagatam bhavantam gotamam dharema.
an3.60:17.3: Bhavanhi gotamo anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti,
an3.60:17.4: bhavanhi gotamo avitakkam avicaram samadhim samapannassa cetasa ceto paricca pajanati:
an3.60:17.5: ‘yatha imassa bhoto manosankhara panihita imassa cittassa anantara amum nama vitakkam vitakkessati’ti.
an3.60:17.7: ‘evam vitakketha, ma evam vitakkayittha; evam manasi karotha, ma evam manasakattha; idam pajahatha, idam upasampajja viharatha’”ti.
an3.60:18.1: “Addha kho tyaham, brahmana, asajja upaniya vaca bhasita;
an3.60:18.3: Ahanhi, brahmana, anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhomi …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vattemi.
an3.60:18.4: Ahanhi, brahmana, avitakkam avicaram samadhim samapannassa cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
an3.60:18.5: ‘yatha imassa bhoto manosankhara panihita, imassa cittassa anantara amum nama vitakkam vitakkessati’ti.
an3.60:18.7: ‘evam vitakketha, ma evam vitakkayittha; evam manasi karotha, ma evam manasakattha; idam pajahatha, idam upasampajja viharatha’”ti.
an3.60:19.1: “Atthi pana, bho gotama, anno ekabhikkhupi yo imehi tihi patihariyehi samannagato, annatra bhota gotamena”ti?
an3.60:19.2: “Na kho, brahmana, ekamyeva satam na dve satani na tini satani na cattari satani na panca satani, atha kho bhiyyova, ye bhikkhu imehi tihi patihariyehi samannagata”ti.
an3.60:19.3: “Kaham pana, bho gotama, etarahi te bhikkhu viharanti”ti?
an3.60:20.2: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
an3.60:20.3: Esaham bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami, dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
an3.60:20.4: Upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
